summary: Diff adds a post-deploy verification script and updates deployment/verification documentation and ads.txt, but does not provide evidence that a mainnet (`ic`) deployment was actually executed or that post-deploy verification was performed on mainnet.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the current application build to the Internet Computer mainnet (ic network) using the steps documented in frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md, producing an updated live canister deployment.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff contains documentation/script additions but no evidence of an actual mainnet deployment being executed (e.g., updated canister IDs, deployment outputs, CI logs, or configuration changes indicating an `ic` deploy was run).
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md updates but no deploy execution artifacts)

missing_requirements.requirement: Perform a brief post-deploy verification on mainnet to confirm core navigation and critical pages work and that ad placement areas render in the layout.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff adds a script and checklist to help verification, but provides no evidence that verification was actually performed on mainnet or that results were recorded (requirement is an action/outcome).

hallucinated_features.description: Post-deploy script includes extra guidance and checks not requested (e.g., AdSense network request validation, tool-specific spot checks, and "Next steps" like submitting to AdSense/monitoring cycles).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest REQ-43 only requires verifying navigation, ad placeholder areas, and ads.txt; additional checks and post-deploy recommendations were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Verification script asserts specific tool counts per category (e.g., Popular Tools = 5, Text & Writing Tools = 9, Number & Conversion Tools = 10, Daily Utilities = 7).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires that navigation works, not that specific category tool counts match particular numbers.
